name: redux-mock-store
description: A mock store for testing your redux async action creators and middleware

scripts.prepublish: rimraf lib && rimraf dist && npm run build
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/redux-mock-store.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/redux-mock-store.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min

author: Arnaud Benard <arnaudm.benard@gmail.com>
